description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国政治人物，现任中华人民共和国商务部党组成员、副部长。
description.en: A political figure in the People's Republic of China, currently serving as a member of the Party Leadership Group and Vice Minister of the Ministry of Commerce.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的执政党。
description.en: The founding and sole ruling party of the People's Republic of China.

nodes.id: 中华人民共和国商务部

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国商务部
en: Ministry of Commerce of the People's Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国务院主管商业经济和贸易的组成部门。
description.en: A constituent department of the State Council of the People's Republic of China responsible for commercial economy and trade.

nodes.id: 中国国际经济技术交流中心

zh-cn: 中国国际经济技术交流中心
en: China International Center for Economic and Technical Exchanges

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国商务部直属事业单位。
description.en: A public institution directly under the Ministry of Commerce of the People's Republic of China.

nodes.id: 中国人民对外友好协会

zh-cn: 中国人民对外友好协会
en: Chinese People's Association for Friendship with Foreign Countries

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国从事民间外交工作的全国性人民团体。
description.en: A national people's organization of the People's Republic of China engaged in people-to-people diplomacy.

description.zh-cn: 鄢东是中国共产党党员。
description.en: Yan Dong is a member of the Communist Party of China.

relationships.target: 中华人民共和国商务部

position.en: Deputy Director-General of the Department of Personnel

description.zh-cn: 鄢东曾担任中华人民共和国商务部人事司副司长。
description.en: Yan Dong previously served as the Deputy Director-General of the Department of Personnel of the Ministry of Commerce of the People's Republic of China.

relationships.target: 中国国际经济技术交流中心

description.zh-cn: 鄢东曾担任中国国际经济技术交流中心主任。
description.en: Yan Dong previously served as the Director of the China International Center for Economic and Technical Exchanges.

relationships.target: 中华人民共和国商务部

position.en: Director-General of the Department of WTO Affairs

description.zh-cn: 鄢东曾担任中华人民共和国商务部世界贸易组织司司长，直至2022年5月。
description.en: Yan Dong previously served as the Director-General of the Department of WTO Affairs of the Ministry of Commerce of the People's Republic of China until May 2022.

relationships.target: 中国人民对外友好协会

description.zh-cn: 2022年5月至2025年2月，鄢东担任中国人民对外友好协会副会长。
description.en: From May 2022 to February 2025, Yan Dong served as the Vice President of the Chinese People's Association for Friendship with Foreign Countries.

relationships.target: 中华人民共和国商务部

description.zh-cn: 2025年2月，鄢东出任中华人民共和国商务部副部长。
description.en: In February 2025, Yan Dong was appointed as the Vice Minister of the Ministry of Commerce of the People's Republic of China.
